attributes.action: order a police investigation onto MP's expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister should order a police investigation into MP's expense claims and all those who have made fraudulent claims(that's all of them) should be prosecuted just as any other individual would be.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
